name: Game Grumps Joint Justice - The GB Files
name_original: Game Grumps Joint Justice - The GB Files
description:
FLASHING WARNING: The game has to fade to switch scenes, which it does very often. It goes white for a split second everytime the screen changes.

A game by one person, inspired by Studio Lovelies' Joint Justice game. The game is a Gameboy game, with minor gbc colors added (only on the title screen). You can play this on emulator, or on original hardware with a flash cart.  The game does not have any audio at all, because I don't know how it works.

The game might be updated later with fixes, extras, and other things. I will post on my twitter for any updates @IAm24Bit.

Thanks a lot!

-IAm24Bit
